Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, Commandant, what brings you to the workshop?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Remember that tiny robot you gave me...?', 3: '6', 4: 'O-oh, nothing. I was just looking around...', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is something wrong?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Did that tiny robot break?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not surprised. After all, it was assembled out of recycled Corrupted parts dating back to the last century...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's about at the end of its life expectancy anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Did you bring it? I'll run some tests on it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I got it right here.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've replaced some of the scrapped parts. But the core chip is too old, and the workshop doesn't have any spares.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do we have to go kill more Corrupted?', 3: '15', 4: 'What should we do?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We can't get this type of chip from dismantling Corrupted. However...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If you really can't go without it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I know where we can buy one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Awesome!', 3: '19', 4: "I'll go get one right now!", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't get your hopes up just yet. Do you know what kind of chip?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Wait a second. You know what kind of chip to buy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Um...', 3: '22', 4: "Can't you just go with me?", 5: '22'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Constructs can only leave if we're on a mission. You'll need to submit an application to your superior if you want me to go with you. Are you sure?", 4: '1'}
{2: "If that's what it takes for you to go with me.", 3: '24', 4: "I don't have any other choice.", 5: '24'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Alright, let's go.", 4: '1'}
